text: Need Cameron Parker for Supercheap Auto campaign. Budget around $3,128, looking for 3 x Blog post, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x Twitter post, 1 x Meet and greet, 1 x LinkedIn post. 11 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 2 months.
